column2: The candidate will be required to undertake a rigorous analysis of big climate and geospatial data to develop climate risk indices and support the core research team primarily with data mining, data analysis, and literature review. The ideal candidate must have an educational background in data science, GIS, Climate studies, Atmospheric sciences, Environmental science, and other allied fields and should have working experience with programming languages such as Python, GIS tools, Microsoft Office and other statistical tools. Knowledge of machine learning and deep learning would be an added advantage.                    In addition to the duties and responsibilities below, the individual should be prepared, as and when necessary, to take on additional responsibilities.                    Job duties and accountabilities                    Primary responsibilities                    Research and analysis                        Use programming languages, primarily Python (libraries like Pandas, NumPy, Xarray), tools like ArcGIS, QGIS, Google Earth Engine, and modern systems of scientific repeatability and engineering scalability (e.g. GitHub) to work on big climate and geospatial data to develop granular climate risk indices.                        Support the core team with working on CMIP5 and CMIP6-based climatological projections to derive climatic outlooks at the sub-national level through statistical methods such as downscaling, bias correction and zonal statistics.                        Support in updating CEEWs existing research based on IPCC frameworks for vulnerability and risk assessments to the latest frameworks in risk assessments.                        Contribute to desktop research and mining data from structured, semi-structured, and unstructured sources to develop and improve our climate risk assessments.                        Working on GIS raster and vector datasets (e.g. NDVI, DEM, Elevation, hydrology network) using QGIS, ArcGIS, and Google Earth Engine derived from platforms like USGS, ESRI, et al.                        Creating GIS shapefiles for analysis and preparing GIS-based maps from the extreme event and climate variability database.                        Supporting the team with carrying out a literature review and research writing about climatological and spatial analysis.                                  Other responsibilities                                  Support the team and build individual capacity in strategic communications through regular blogs.                        Respond to research requests from senior researchers, discuss research needs, and prepare responses that synthesize and analyze information.                          Assist with program implementation, including help with preparing presentations.                        Assist with planning and executing events such as report launches, consultation workshops, round table discussions, etc.                        Participate constructively in weekly team meetings.                        Provide inputs on research methodology and data analysis tools.                                  Selection Criteria                    Qualification                        Preferably Masters/Bachelors degree in data science, climate studies, atmospheric science, GIS, environmental science, and other allied fields. Candidates pursuing their degrees can also apply.                                  Work experience                        0-1 years. Candidates pursuing their Bachelors/Masters can apply.                        Key skills                        Subject domain knowledge of climate data analytics, atmospheric sciences, meteorology and geospatial technology.                        Proficiency in working with big climate and geospatial data in NetCDF, raster, and vector formats.                        Demonstrated ability to use the Python programming language and proficiency in using Jupyter Notebook and Python libraries like Xarray, Pandas, Geopandas and NumPy.                          Proficiency in climate statistics and understanding of climatic projections derived from Global and regional climate models and their downscaling, bias correction etc.                        Proficiency in ArcGIS/QGIS/Google Earth Engine.                        Good knowledge of statistical tools (Excel, SPSS) and their applications.                        Demonstrated ability to perform a literature review.

column2: As a Data Modeler, you will play a crucial role in designing, implementing, and maintaining data models that support the organization's data management and analytics initiatives. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements, translate them into data models, and ensure the integrity, consistency, and efficiency of the organization's data assets.   Responsibilities: Data Modeling : Design and develop conceptual, logical, and physical data models that capture the organization's data requirements and business rules. Translate business requirements into data models that adhere to best practices and standards. Database Design : Collaborate with database administrators, data engineers, and other stakeholders to translate data models into physical database schemas. Define tables, columns, indexes, constraints, and relationships to optimize data storage, retrieval, and performance. Data Governance : Establish and enforce data governance policies, standards, and guidelines related to data modeling, metadata management, and data quality. Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and industry best practices. Data Analysis : Analyze existing data structures, systems, and processes to identify opportunities for improvement. Recommend enhancements to data models, database designs, and data management practices to support evolving business needs. Collaboration : Work closely with business stakeholders, data analysts, data scientists, and application developers to understand data requirements, resolve data-related issues, and ensure alignment between data models and business objectives. Documentation : Document data models, database designs, data dictionaries, and other artifacts to facilitate knowledge sharing, collaboration, and future maintenance. Maintain documentation in a clear, organized, and accessible manner. Quality Assurance : Perform quality assurance checks on data models to ensure accuracy, completeness, and consistency. Validate data models against business requirements and perform impact analysis on proposed changes. Performance Tuning : Identify performance bottlenecks in data models and database designs. Collaborate with database administrators and data engineers to optimize query performance, index usage, and data retrieval efficiency. Training and Education : Provide training, mentorship, and guidance to junior data modelers, data analysts, and other team members. Share knowledge and best practices related to data modeling, database design, and data management. Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, Information Systems, or a related field. Proven experience as a Data Modeler, Data Architect, or similar role in data management and analytics. Proficiency in data modeling tools and techniques (e.g., ER/Studio, ERwin, PowerDesigner). Strong understanding of relational database concepts, SQL, and database management systems (e.g., Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL). Experience with dimensional modeling, NoSQL databases, and big data technologies is a plus. Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills. Ability to work effectively in a collaborative, cross-functional team environment. Knowledge of data governance principles, data quality management, and regulatory compliance requirements.
column11: Data Modelling, ERwin, S3, Redshift Db, Data Mapping

column2: About the Company:   PASS with GOKUL  is an E-Learning platform crafted by Gokul Infocare Australia. Founded in 2010, Gokul Infocare provides services across various sectors including SAP, GIS, IoT, Asset Tracking, IT Recruitment, and Artificial Intelligence Applications. Current Project: The primary focus will be on the  PASS with GOKUL  platform, which offers a platform for competitive examination quizzes and educational materials. The team includes Gold Medalists, Professional Doctors, IITians, and Subject Matter Experts  Job Details: This is a permanent Work From Home position for a Junior/Fresher Data Engineer  Role & responsibilities   Collect data from global sources, primarily educational data for competitive examinations. Perform data cleansing using Microsoft Excel and SQL. Engage in data conversion and management in coordination with Subject Matter Experts and Python programmers. Upload data to our PASS with GOKUL e-learning platform and verify accuracy. Work independently as a self-learner with support available as needed. You will be provided with detailed instructions and training, with chances to further develop your skills in Python programming, AI development, and other areas of your interest. Mandatory Requirements:   Must be an Engineering graduate (No current students). Must own a laptop/PC with a faster internet connection Very Good Communication Skills Strong attention to detail and proficient in Google search.  Please note that all the above are Mandatory and if you do not meet ALL of them, then this position is not suitable for you.   Preferred candidate profile    Fresh graduates must have a minimum GPA of 7.5. Experienced candidates should have a background in data collection, cleansing, and management. Location of Work: Permanent Work From Home Timings: Monday to Saturday 8 Hours a day (Preferred candidates who can start before 9 AM) Joining Date: Immediate to Less than 2 Weeks. (We do not accept applications where the notice period is more than 2 weeks) Remuneration: First 3 Months - INR 10,000 per month Next 3 Months - INR 15,000 per month After 6 Months - INR 20,000 per month Every Year Guaranteed Salary increase of 15% Selection Process:   1. Task 1 - To assess your Data Collection Skills 2. Task 2 - To evaluate your knowledge/experience in Data Management 3. Zoom Video interview with HR 4. Final Zoom Video interview with Project Manager    Please ensure all requirements are met before applying. Only apply if you are satisfied with the above terms. After reviewing the responses you provide in your application, we will send you Task 1.

column2: Scope of the role:   We rely on powerfully insightful data to power our systems and solutions. Were seeking an experienced data scientist to deliver that insight to us on a daily basis. Our ideal team member will have the mathematical and statistical expertise youd expect, but a natural curiosity and creative mind thats not so easy to find. As you mine, interpret and clean our data, we will rely on you to ask questions, connect the dots, and uncover opportunities that lie hidden withinall with the ultimate goal of realizing the datas full potential. You will join a team of data specialists, but will ??lice and dice??data using your own methods, creating new visions for the future.  Key Responsibilities:   Collaborate with the strategy team to develop an understanding of the needs    Research and devise innovative statistical models for data analysis    Communicate findings to all stakeholders    Enable smarter business processes??nd implement analytics for meaningful insights    Keep current with technology and industry developments   Daily and Monthly Responsibilities    Work as the lead data strategist, identifying and integrating new datasets that can be leveraged through our product capabilities and work closely with the engineering team to strategize and execute the development of data products    Execute analytical experiments methodically to help solve various problems and make a true impact across various domains    Identify relevant data sources and sets to mine for business needs, and collect large structured and unstructured datasets and variables    Devise and utilize algorithms and models to mine big data stores, perform data and error analysis to improve models, and clean and validate data for uniformity and accuracy    Analyze data for trends and patterns, and Interpret data with a clear objective in mind    Implement analytical models into production by collaborating with software developers and machine learning engineers.    Communicate analytic solutions to stakeholders and implement improvements as needed to operational systems  Must-Haves:    Bachelors degree in statistics, applied mathematics, or a related discipline    2+ years experience in data science    Proficiency in data mining, mathematics, and statistical analysis    Advanced pattern recognition and predictive modeling experience    Experience with Excel, PowerPoint, Tableau, SQL, and programming languages (i.e., Java/Python, SAS)    Comfort working in a dynamic, research-oriented group with several ongoing concurrent projects

column2: The Sustainable Mobility team at CEEW is looking for a Research Analyst to join our dynamic team, dedicated to transforming road transport   Our focus spans various vehicles - from 2 and 3-wheelers to cars, buses, and medium and heavy-duty trucks     As part of our team, you will be crucial in fostering evidence-based policymaking that empowers and informs city, state, and national governments, nodal agencies, academia, policymakers, industry stakeholders, and the general public       This position primarily defines, develops, and implements innovative data-driven solutions to understand and predict EVs adoption and usage patterns (driving and charging), future charging infrastructure requirements, and energy-transport nexus such as renewable energy integration, smart charging, vehicle-to-grid and green hydrogen     The role requires exceptional programming and analytical proficiency       We welcome a broad spectrum of applicants: whether youre seasoned in your field, a recent graduate, or have specialised knowledge     What truly sets you apart is your enthusiasm for sustainable transportation, your curiosity to apply data science in addressing real-world challenges, and your eagerness to learn and evolve                   Job duties and accountabilities             Research and Project Management Unit Support:           Assist the team in generating snackable insights and compelling data visuals for the organisation s social media platforms.             Conduct analyses involving a combination of multiple complex data layers, network analysis and detailed visualisation of the outputs. These data layers will include information on public transit, socio-economics of population, people movement, road-safety, pollution, congestion, land-use, and survey data.             Clean, manage, and analyze extensive data sets, generating valuable insights that address primary research questions and objectives..             Meticulously extrapolate and validate data, analysis, and research conducted by analysts. Responsible for evaluating, organizing, and refining this data into comprehensive yet concise reports and other materials, ensuring clarity, accuracy, and effectiveness in communication               Formulate, develop and apply predictive analysis, supervised and unsupervised learning and statistical (exploratory and confirmatory) techniques.                 Geoinformatics and geospatial analytics using GIS software (e.g., QGIS, ArcGIS)                 Ability to communicate findings through comprehensive reports and presentations tailored for diverse audiences.                 Support our stakeholder engagements by actively seeking new partnerships and maintaining existing relationships.               To generate knowledge content blogs, articles, briefs in regular intervals.             Support specific projects and overall activity planning related to electric vehicle transition and sustainable mobility research. Facilitate collaboration and integration of efforts across various research teams.     Q   ualification         Masters in    Science / Engineering / Technology / Economics       Work experience                   1+ years experience.                       Candidates who may not meet the minimum work and or education qualification experience requirement but possess comparable expertise and skills in relevant areas are also encouraged to apply. Such candidates should demonstrate a strong foundation in data science and a clear understanding of electric vehicle technologies, energy research or mobility analytics       Key skills                   Intermediate to preferably advanced levels of software and computer programming proficiency (e.g., SQL, JAVA, HTML, VBA, Python)                   Intermediate to preferably advanced quantitative, data analytics and modelling experience (e.g., R, SPSS, STATA)                   Intermediate to preferably advanced levels of proficiency in scraping, extracting, collating and organizing web-based information (e.g., Selenium, BeautifulSoup, HTML, CSS, Javascript)                   Intermediate to preferably advanced data visualization (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) and spatial analysis (QGIS or ArcGIS is a must).                   Must have strong research skills capability to carry out literature review is a key requisite.                   Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.                     Willingness to work on multi-disciplinary projects.                       Ability to think on your feet for solving complex and evolving problems in mobility.             Additional Considerations:             Background and experience in one or more of the following sub-themes is a plus                   Comparative techno-economic assessments of different powertrains and fuel, vehicle stock and flow dynamics, traffic flow and travel demand modelling                   Fundamentals of EVs technology, charging and their economic and environmental benefits                   Collect, compile and integrate diverse data sources, types and format spatial data to inform EV charging infrastructure roll-out, grid integration considerations, asset utilization, optimal sizing and siting.                       Awareness of EV policies at national to city/local levels.                   Charging infrastructure deployment strategies, especially along highway corridors for facilitating inter-city and long-distance travel.

column2: Position Summary                               Position is responsible for supporting the Data Governance Office (DGO) in the delivery of best-in-class methodologies for the design and implementation of the Enterprise Wide Data Catalog for Data Governance Strategy. This position is responsible for supporting the Data Governance Office in creation of Policies, Procedures, Standards and Metadata. This position will develop and maintain supporting data governance documentation, including training materials, meeting agendas, announcements, communications plans, project plans, and meeting minutes. The position will create and maintain status reports, issues lists, and monitor metrics and SLA s.     Establish and lead a central team that focuses on Enterprise Data Management aspects including Governance, Quality, Architecture, Policy and Compliance.     Transform Data Strategy into operational (BAU) /Promote result & improvement-oriented culture.                                 Job Responsibilities                                 Essential Functions                             Work with business teams and technical analysts to understand business requirements. Determine how to leverage visualization technology to create reporting solutions satisfying business requirements.                             Participate in business analysis activities to gather required reporting and dashboard   requirements                             Provide technical assistance and cross training to other team members.                             Provide training and assistance to users for generation of ad-hoc reports                             Design and implement technology best practices, guidelines, and repeatable processes                             Translate business requirements into specifications that will be used to implement the   required reports and dashboards, created from potentially multiple data sources                             Present the dashboard and reports solutions to the business, project teams, and other stakeholders - with the ability to efficiently speak in technical and non-technical language.                             Analyze IT operational data (plan-build-run, resources, projects, device availability, development progress) for trends and performance indicators.                             Mentor and train users, from executives all the way to end analysts, on the effective usage and purpose of centrally managed reporting.                             Work with stakeholders to produce packaged Reporting solutions & offerings, in addition to supporting Analytics/Governance projects and PoCs/PoVs.                             Collaborates with business and technology departments to understand system data and its use, data analysis and validation, and provides support around the data and how it is integrated                             Publish reports via the Power BI service, manage them through distribution of apps and monitor usage/data refreshes/security access.                             Define Semantic Model & BI Access Layer in DWH using tables / views as per reporting requirements.                             Working with large data sets containing entire spectrum of data viz unstructured and structured data consisting of categorical data, ratio data, Interval data and Language inputs                                     Knowledge, Skills and Abilities                                       Education                       Bachelor/ Post Graduate/ Master in Accounting, Computer Science, Investments, Finance Business Administration, Communications as well as any other related field of expertise                                 Experience                     4 to 7 years of experience in the Financial Services Industry in the following areas: Business Analysis, Compliance, Audit, Data Management, Data Analysis & Reporting, or Project Management                                   Knowledge and skills        (general and technical)                           Good Stakeholder & People management skills                                 Demonstrate superior verbal communication and relationship building skills                                 Good knowledge of Microsoft Office tools, including MS PowerPoint, Visio, and MS Project developing high-quality visual aid materials for senior management presentations.                                 SharePoint content management skills                                 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills                                 Ability to work independently                                 Relevant experience in Financial Services industry, Capital Markets and Investment Products                                 Demonstrate ability to handle concurrent assignments                               Hands on experience in diverse fields viz Business Intelligence, ETL or Data Governance is an added advantage

column2: Dear Candidate, Greetings from Randstad India !! This is Khusshbu here and I came across your resume on a job portal. We have a C2H Opportunity with  Novartis.  Randstad is an international HR Solution partner that employs around 29,320 of its own staff, whilst 580,000 people are deployed in other companies every day through Randstad. Globally, Randstad has 4,496 branches. Randstad India is a division of Dutch-based Randstad Holding NV, a Dutch multinational human resource consulting firm headquartered in Diemen, the Netherlands. About the company:  Novartis AG is a Swiss multinational pharmaceutical corporation based in Basel, Switzerland. Consistently ranked in the global top five, Novartis is one of the largest pharmaceutical companies in the world and was the fourth largest by revenue in 2022. Wikipedia Novartis    Headquartered in Basel, Switzerland, we are a leading global medicines company. We discover and develop breakthrough treatments and find new ways to deliver them to as many people as possible. We use innovative science and digital technologies to create transformative treatments in areas of great medical need. In our quest to find new medicines, we consistently rank among the world?? top companies investing in research and development. We also aim to reward those who invest their money, time and ideas in our company. Novartis Over the last five years, Novartis has spent over USD 300 million in creating an R&D support center and services in India. One of the three major global development sites for Novartis, the Drug Development Centre in Hyderabad has integrated development capabilities and a strong operational footprint. With an additional investment of USD 49 million, we are also in the process of expanding further by setting up a manufacturing plant at Kalwe. This plant would manufacture oral cancer medicines for the global market. At Novartis, we use science-based innovation to address some of society?? most challenging healthcare issues. Building trust with society with responsibility is a key pillar of the Novartis corporate strategy. It defines our approach to managing our key Environment, Social and Corporate Governance Goals (ESG) and Corporate responsibility topics and risks: being part of the solution on pricing and access, addressing global health challenges, being a responsible citizen, and holding ourselves to high ethical standards. We have long-standing commitment towards Zero Leprosy and Water Neutrality, amongst others. column2: A career within Data and Analytics services will provide you with the opportunity to help organisations uncover enterprise insights and drive business results using smarter data analytics      We focus on a collection of organisational technology capabilities, including business intelligence, data management, and data assurance that help our clients drive innovation, growth, and change within their organisations in order to keep up with the changing nature of customers and technology      We make impactful decisions by mixing mind and machine to leverage data, understand and navigate risk, and help our clients gain a competitive edge      As part of our Analytics and Insights Consumption team, you ll analyze data to drive useful insights for clients to address core business issues or to drive strategic outcomes      Youll use visualization, statistical and analytics models, AI/ML techniques, Modelops and other techniques to develop these insights                        As a Senior Associate, youll work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business issues from strategy to execution. PwC Professional skills and responsibilities for this management level include but are not limited to:            Use feedback and reflection to develop self awareness, personal strengths and address development areas.      Delegate to others to provide stretch opportunities, coaching them to deliver results.      Demonstrate critical thinking and the ability to bring order to unstructured problems.      Use a broad range of tools and techniques to extract insights from current industry or sector trends.      Review your work and that of others for quality, accuracy and relevance.      Know how and when to use tools available for a given situation and can explain the reasons for this choice.      Seek and embrace opportunities which give exposure to different situations, environments and perspectives.      Use straightforward communication, in a structured way, when influencing and connecting with others.      Able to read situations and modify behavior to build quality relationships.      Uphold the firms code of ethics and business conduct.                                GenAI Data Scientist - Senior Associate                      PwC US - Acceleration Center is seeking a highly skilled and experienced GenAI Data Scientist to join our team at Senior Associate level        As a GenAI Data Scientist, you will play a critical role in developing and implementing machine learning models and algorithms for our GenAI projects      The ideal candidate should have a strong background in data science, with a focus on GenAI technologies, and possess a solid understanding of statistical analysis, machine learning, data visualization, and application programming                   Responsibilities:              - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and identify opportunities for applying GenAI technologies.              - Develop and implement machine learning models and algorithms for GenAI projects.              - Perform data cleaning, preprocessing, and feature engineering to prepare data for analysis.              - Collaborate with data engineers to ensure efficient data processing and integration into machine learning pipelines.              - Validate and evaluate model performance using appropriate metrics and techniques.              - Develop and deploy production-ready machine learning applications and solutions.              - Utilize object-oriented programming skills to build robust and scalable software components.              - Utilize Kubernetes for container orchestration and deployment.              - Design and build chatbots using GenAI technologies.              - Communicate findings and insights to stakeholders through data visualizations, reports, and presentations.              - Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in GenAI technologies and recommend innovative solutions to enhance data science processes.                  Requirements:              - Bachelors or Masters degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or a related field.              - 3-5 years of relevant technical/technology experience, with a focus on GenAI projects.              - Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, R, or Scala.              - Proficiency in machine learning libraries and frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn.              - Experience with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data wrangling techniques.              - Solid understanding of statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, and experimental design.              - Familiarity with cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.              - Knowledge of data visualization tools and techniques.              - Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.              - Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.              - Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.                  Preferred Qualifications:              - Experience with object-oriented programming languages such as Java, C++, or C#.              - Experience with developing and deploying machine learning applications in production environments.              - Understanding of data privacy and compliance regulations.              - Relevant certifications in data science or GenAI technologies.                  Nice to Have Skills:              - Experience with Azure AI Search, Azure Doc Intelligence, Azure OpenAI, AWS Textract, AWS Open Search, AWS Bedrock.              - Familiarity with LLM backed agent frameworks such as Autogen, Langchain, Semantic Kernel, etc.              - Experience in chatbot design and development.

column1: S&C Global Network - AI - Industrial - Consultant Data Science
column2: Entity :- Accenture Strategy & Consulting Team :- Global Network Data & AI Practice :- Industrial Practice Title :- Ind & Func AI Decision Science Consultant Job location :- Bangalore, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Chennai, Pune About S&C - Global  Network :- Accenture Strategy & Consulting Global Network - Data & AI practice help our clients grow their business in entirely new ways. Analytics enables our clients to achieve high performance through insights from data - insights that inform better decisions and strengthen customer relationships. From strategy to execution, Accenture works with organizations to develop analytic capabilities - from accessing and reporting on data to predictive modelling - to outperform the competition. WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? We are seeking a skilled and experienced Data Scientist to join our Industrial practice. The ideal candidate should have hands-on experience in data science within industries such as manufacturing, engineering services, industrial & heavy equipment, construction, and consumer durables. As a Data Scientist, you will be responsible for developing AI models/applying GenAI techniques in areas such as predictive asset maintenance, production optimization, smart mobility, battery management systems, and connected products. What you would do in this role Develop and implement AI models to address business challenges in manufacturing, industrial equipment, engineering services, and related industries. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and deploy models into production environments. Utilize your expertise in MES/PLM/ERP/Historian systems to integrate data sources and ensure seamless operation of AI solutions. Design and develop machine learning models using Python, with proficiency in NLP and Computer Vision techniques. Architect functional solutions and provide technical guidance to enhance the performance and scalability of AI systems. Leverage cloud platforms, with preference for Azure, and experience with GCP/AWS is also valued. Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends, contributing to continuous improvement initiatives within the organization. Qualifications Who we are looking for? Bachelors or masters degree in Statistics / Economics / Mathematics /Computer Science or MBA in Data Science related disciplines from Premier Colleges 3-8 years of hands-on experience in data science, with a focus on industries mentioned above. Proven track record of developing AI models in areas such as predictive maintenance, production optimization, and connected products. Strong proficiency in Python programming, with experience in NLP and Computer Vision. Exposure to MES/PLM/ERP/Historian systems and understanding of their integration with AI solutions. Experience with cloud platforms, preferably Azure, and familiarity with GCP/AWS. Knowledge of LLM exposure and experience with tools such as ChatGPT, Llama 2, Claude 2, Hugging Face, etc., will be an advantage.

    You are a team player     Excellent English communication skills (verbal & written)     Bachelor s Degree     5+ years of IT experience with Master s degree                   SPECIALIZED SKILLS OR Informatica Cloud Integration Services (IICS)                     Data Build Tool (DBT)                      Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI)                     Agile/Scrum                 Nice to Have           Previous Medtronic experience           Previous experience at multi-billion dollar global organizations         Previous experience supporting column1: GN - SONG - MT - Generative AI - Consultant
column2: The Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song Practice | Marketing Transformation | Generative AI Consultant  Join our team of Marketing Transformation consultants who solve customer facing challenges at clients spanning sales, service, and marketing to accelerate business change. Practice :The Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song |  Areas of Work :Generative AI |  Level :Consultant|  Location :Delhi, Mumbai, Pune, Bangalore, Gurgaon, Hyderabad |  Years of Exp:  4-8 years Explore an Exciting Career at Accenture  Are you passionate about scaling businesses using in-depth frameworks and techniques to solve customer facing challenges? Do you want to design, build and implement strategies to enhance business performance? Does working in an inclusive and collaborative environment spark your interest? Then, this is the right place for you! Welcome to a host of exciting global opportunities within Accenture's Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song practice. The Practice-A Brief Sketch The practice is aligned to the Global Network Song Practice of Accenture and works with clients across their marketing, sales, and services functions. As part of the team, you will provide transformation services driven by key offerings like Living Marketing, Connected Commerce and Next-Generation Customer Care. These services help our clients become living businesses by optimizing their marketing, sales and customer service strategy, thereby driving cost reduction, revenue enhancement, customer satisfaction and impacting front end business metrics in a positive manner. The Generative AI Consultant is an intermediate-level position within the Marketing Transformation offering of S&C GN Song. The Gen AI consultant will work closely with our clients to help design, build and implement initiatives that can help enhance business performance. The key responsibilities will be to- Support client engagements by applying Generative AI methodologies and driving data-driven decision-making. Work closely with project manager to help ideate, formulate and finalize the best suited Gen AI led solution to address the client requirement. Design and help develop tailored Generative AI solutions, considering specific use cases, data availability, and business objectives- need a hands-on person who has worked independently on these aspects in AI/ Gen AI domain Liaise with technical and client teams to build, train, and fine-tune Generative AI models using state-of-the-art algorithms, ensuring model performance, accuracy, and adherence to ethical guidelines. Demonstrate a sound functional expertise of Gen AI along with broad understanding of foundation model & LLM's. Should have sound knowledge of Marketing domain covering from Brand, Content management, Ad-Tech, Martech, Media and Marketing operations. Demonstrate robust problem-solving abilities by thinking strategically and creatively to identify and tackle challenges and capitalize on opportunities. Possess knowledge and hands-on experience with data extraction, data analysis and data visualization to identify patterns, preprocess data and develop appropriate Generative AI models. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure project success, including managing timelines, resources and client expectations. Possess strong communication, presentation and analytical skills, enabling effective client engagement and stakeholder management. Stay on top of the latest Gen AI developments and leverage the same in client conversations and engagements. Key Skills: Strong foundation in Generative AI, Familiarity with NLP techniques and tools, such as spaCy, NLTK, or BERT, Proficiency programming languages such as Python, R, or TensorFlow is an added advantage, Digital customer experience, Strategic thinking, Analytical skills, Effective communication, UX/UI design, and market research skills In addition, in order to excel at the role, you will need to have Understanding of business dynamics, market trends, and competitive landscapes to leverage this knowledge to align generative AI strategies with broader business objectives, facilitating meaningful digital transformation for our clients. Strong project management abilities for the oversight of generative AI initiatives, including managing timelines, budgets, and resources to ensure the seamless implementation of projects. Aptitude for leading and inspiring cross-functional teams, fostering collaboration, and driving alignment toward generative AI objectives to align successful project outcomes. Analytical skills to draw insights from extensive datasets, combining them with macroeconomic factors and competitive benchmarks, for deriving actionable insights that provide value to stakeholders. Proficiency in working effectively within a dynamic, fast-paced environment, both offshore and onshore Strong communication and presentation skills for effectively conveying complex AI concepts and strategies to key stakeholders, enabling informed decision-making. Managing clients, developing relationships, and ensuring client satisfaction for the success of projects. Demonstrate leadership qualities combined with problem-solving, organizational, and delegation skills to inspire and nurture team members, driving peak performance. Proficiency in identifying new opportunities and crafting comprehensive solutions. Take ownership of proposals from inception to completion, contributing to the enhancement of generative AI strategy offerings. Identify growth areas in skills, platforms, and assets to strengthen our brand's generative AI strategy offerings, keeping us at the forefront of industry innovation. Read about us.

column1: Artificial Intelligence Senior Analyst- Insights and Intelligence
column2: Skill required:Artificial Intelligence Innovation - Data Science  Designation:Artificial Intelligence Senior Analyst  Job Location:Bengaluru  Qualifications:BE/BTech/MTech/Phd  Years of Experience:5 to 8 years  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Insights&Intelligence vertical and help us generate insights by leveraging the latest Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Analytics techniques to deliver value to our clients. You will also help us apply your expertise in building world-class solutions, conquering business problems, addressing technical challenges using AI Platforms and technologies. You will be required to utilize the existing frameworks, standards, patterns to create architectural foundation and services necessary for AI applications that scale from multi-user to enterprise-class and demonstrate yourself as an expert by actively blogging, publishing research papers, and creating awareness in this emerging area. The Artificial Intelligence Innovation team is responsible for the creation, deployment, and managing the operation of projects. They help build responsible AI solutions that benefit users, communities, and society at large, guided by core principles that help deliver desired outcomes while engendering trust. The team collaborates with business experts, research, and platform engineers for coming up with creative solutions. In this role, you will be working on the interdisciplinary field about scientific methods, processes and systems to extract knowledge or insights from data in various forms, either structured or unstructured.  What are we looking for? Python (Programming Language)  Machine Learning  Natural Language Processing (NLP)  Deep Learning  GenAI / LLM / Prompt Engineering  Ability to perform under pressure  Ability to establish strong client relationship  Ability to handle disputes  Ability to manage multiple stakeholders  Ability to understand business challenges  Focus on business outcomes and ability to work with different cross functional teams Roles and Responsibilities  In this role, you need to analyze and solve moderately complex problems.  You are required to create new solutions, leveraging and, where needed, adapting existing methods and procedures.  You are required to understand the strategic direction set by senior management, clearly communicate team goals, deliverables, and keep the team updated on change.  Your primary upward interactions are with your direct supervisor.  You may interact with peers and/or management levels at a client and/or within Accenture.  You will be provided with guidance when determining methods and procedures on new assignments.  The decisions that are made by you will often impact your team.  You would be an individual contributor and/or oversee a small work effort and/or team.  Please note this role may require you to work in rotational shifts.

column1: S&C Global Network - AI - Industrial - Consultant Data Science
column2: Entity :- Accenture Strategy & Consulting Team :- Global Network Data & AI Practice :- Industrial Practice Title :- Ind & Func AI Decision Science Consultant Job location :- Bangalore, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Chennai, Pune About S&C - Global  Network :- Accenture Strategy & Consulting Global Network - Data & AI practice help our clients grow their business in entirely new ways. Analytics enables our clients to achieve high performance through insights from data - insights that inform better decisions and strengthen customer relationships. From strategy to execution, Accenture works with organizations to develop analytic capabilities - from accessing and reporting on data to predictive modelling - to outperform the competition. WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? We are seeking a skilled and experienced Data Scientist to join our Industrial practice. The ideal candidate should have hands-on experience in data science within industries such as manufacturing, engineering services, industrial & heavy equipment, construction, and consumer durables. As a Data Scientist, you will be responsible for developing AI models/applying GenAI techniques in areas such as predictive asset maintenance, production optimization, smart mobility, battery management systems, and connected products. What you would do in this role Develop and implement AI models to address business challenges in manufacturing, industrial equipment, engineering services, and related industries. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and deploy models into production environments. Utilize your expertise in MES/PLM/ERP/Historian systems to integrate data sources and ensure seamless operation of AI solutions. Design and develop machine learning models using Python, with proficiency in NLP and Computer Vision techniques. Architect functional solutions and provide technical guidance to enhance the performance and scalability of AI systems. Leverage cloud platforms, with preference for Azure, and experience with GCP/AWS is also valued. Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends, contributing to continuous improvement initiatives within the organization. Qualification Who we are looking for? Bachelor's or master's degree in Statistics / Economics / Mathematics /Computer Science or MBA in Data Science related disciplines from Premier Colleges 3-8 years of hands-on experience in data science, with a focus on industries mentioned above. Proven track record of developing AI models in areas such as predictive maintenance, production optimization, and connected products. Strong proficiency in Python programming, with experience in NLP and Computer Vision. Exposure to MES/PLM/ERP/Historian systems and understanding of their integration with AI solutions. Experience with cloud platforms, preferably Azure, and familiarity with GCP/AWS. Knowledge of LLM exposure and experience with tools such as ChatGPT, Llama 2, Claude 2, Hugging Face, etc., will be an advantage.

Experience: 3-5 years in project management,  with significant expertise in process mining,  business intelligence,  and data analytics.  Strong preference for experience with Celonis,  Qlik Sense,  and Alteryx.       Expertise: Specialization in process consulting & management,  technology consulting,  data mining,  business intelligence,  big data,  cloud computing,  machine learning,  BPM,  Lean,  Six Sigma.       Certifications: Six Sigma Green Belt or Black Belt certification preferred.  Additional certifications in project management (PMP,  Agile,  Scrum) or data analytics beneficial.       Technical Proficiency: Proficiency in at least one tool: SQL,  Spark,  BI tools (Alteryx,  Tableau,  Qliksense),  Cloud platforms (Google/AWS/Azure),  or Process Modeling & Mining Tools (Celonis,  Signavio).       Additional Experience: Familiarity with process management,  common programming languages (Java,  Python),  ERP systems (SAP,  Oracle),  deep learning,  random forests advantageous.       Personal Qualities: High commitment,  strong leadership,  team orientation,  analytical and conceptual thinking,  goal-oriented,  agile methodology,  passion for complex projects.       Communication Skills: Exceptional ability to communicate effectively with technical teams,  business stakeholders,  and clients.       Adaptability and Innovation: Flexible and innovative approach to rapidly changing project requirements and technology landscapes.           Project Management and Delivery: Oversee the complete lifecycle of process mining projects from initiation to closure,  ensuring timely delivery within scope and budget; own the daily management thru sprint planning,  velocity & workload management      Stakeholder Management: Serve as the primary liaison for Business,  project teams,  and internal and external stakeholders,  ensuring effective communication and expectation management.       Team Mentorship: Mentor a team of process mining analysts and consultants,  identify skill gaps thru daily deliverable management,  skill gap assessments,  & providing inputs to leadership on addressing skill enhancement and / or people related issues.       Process Improvement: Utilize process mining tools like Celonis to analyze,  visualize,  and optimize business processes,  identifying inefficiencies and opportunities for improvement.       Solution Design: Work with technical teams to create and implement process mining solutions that meet specific Business needs.       Analysis and Support: Analyze supply chain,  logistics,  production,  or support processes with your team using advanced technologies and data-based modeling.  Assist business customers in integrating real-time data into decision-making and process execution.       Quality Assurance: Uphold high standards of quality for all deliverables,  aligning with company and client expectations by employing best practices in project management and process mining.       Reporting: Generate detailed reports on project status,  insights from process mining analysis,  and improvement recommendations for stakeholders.       CoE Support: Contribute to the establishment and management of the Process Mining CoE,  promoting best practices and knowledge sharing.  Take professional accountability and closely collaborate with business partners and process re-engineers.       Growth and Quality Focus: Support the acquisition of new projects and business areas,  develop intellectual property,  and integrate service offerings with emerging technologies.  Foster a culture of Process & Operation Excellence through collaboration across the organization.

column2: Job Description: Data Scientist Company: SB Solutions Private Limited Location: Hyderabad Type: Full-time About the Company: Join us at SB Solutions Private Limited (www.sbsolutions.in), a leader in Deep Technology Services and Solutions, dedicated to innovating and transforming the way data is shaping the industry. We are committed to leveraging advanced technologies to solve real-world challenges and enhance decision-making processes. Position Overview: We are seeking a skilled Data Scientist with specialized expertise in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Deep Learning to join our dynamic team. This role focuses on developing and refining a conversational navigational assistant as part of our ambitious Platform Trainer project. The ideal candidate will be instrumental in driving the project from conceptualization to deployment, ensuring the system is robust, efficient, and user-centric. Key Responsibilities : Model Development: Design, build, and train advanced machine learning models with a focus on NLP and Deep Learning to power conversational AI within our platform. Use LLMs to solve complex problems for the enterprises. Data Management: Collect, process, and maintain data pipelines, ensuring data integrity, efficiency, and alignment with project needs. Analytics and Testing: Implement and execute robust testing frameworks to evaluate the effectiveness of AI models, focusing on continual improvement and optimization. Collaboration and Leadership: Work closely with cross-functional teams including software developers and product managers to integrate AI capabilities into enterprise platforms. Provide insights and lead discussions on innovative AI solutions. Research and Development: Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI, NLP, and machine learning. Apply cutting-edge research to practical applications within our projects. Documentation and Reporting: Maintain comprehensive documentation of the development process, model architectures, and performance metrics. Prepare reports and presentations to share findings and progress with stakeholders. Qualifications : Education: PHD and Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field. Experience: Minimum of 3 years of professional experience in NLP and Deep Learning (Master's) and 0-3 years of experience (PHD) Proven track record of developing and deploying machine learning models, particularly in the context of NLP. Technical Skills: Proficient in programming languages such as Python and frameworks/libraries like TensorFlow, Py Torch, Keras, and Hugging Face Transformers. Strong understanding of NLP techniques and models (e.g., BERT, GPT-3, Llama, Mixtral) and their applications. Experience with SQL and database management systems along with insightful knowledge of Relational Algebra. Familiarity with cloud services (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and machine learning deployment techniques. Analytical Skills: Excellent problem-solving abilities with a strong mathematical foundation in statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms. Able to understand research literature and build or tune statistical/mathematical techniques. Communication Skills: Exceptional communication skills, capable of explaining complex technical details and project results to non-technical stakeholders. What We Offer: A competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package. Opportunities for professional development and access to learning resources. A creative and innovative work environment. The chance to work on cutting-edge projects that influence the Enterprises globally and locally alike. How to Apply : Please submit your resume and a cover letter explaining your interest in the role and how your skills and experience align with our project needs to research@sbsolutions.in. We look forward to exploring how your expertise in NLP and Deep Learning can contribute to the success of our Platform Trainer project.

Proficient in MS Azure, DataBricks, and Azure Data Factory. Strong skills in SQL and experience in data wrangling and manipulation of large data sets (petabytes). PySpark is preferred. Solid experience in software development, particularly in enhancing and maintaining codebases. Familiarity with software development frameworks and best practices. Understanding of CI/CD processes, with hands-on experience in Azure DevOps or similar environments. Ability to manage software deployment and updates efficiently. Understand and implement CI/CD processes within complex Azure DevOps environments, ensuring seamless software deployment and updates. column2: As a data modeler, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining conceptual, logical, and physical data models for various business applications and systems. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams including data architects, database administrators, software developers, and business analysts to ensure that data models meet the requirements of stakeholders and adhere to best practices in data management. Key Responsibilities : Data Modeling : - Develop conceptual, logical, and physical data models based on business requirements and industry standards. Translate business requirements into data models that support data warehousing, reporting, analytics, and application development. Data Analysis : - Analyze existing data structures and systems to identify opportunities for improvement and optimization. Conduct data profiling and data quality assessments to ensure accuracy, completeness, and consistency of data models. Database Design : - Collaborate with database administrators and developers to design and implement database schemas, tables, indexes, and constraints. Optimize database performance and scalability through effective data modeling techniques. Data Governance : - Enforce data governance policies and standards to ensure data integrity, security, and privacy. Define data naming conventions, data dictionaries, and metadata repositories to facilitate data management and documentation. Requirements Gathering : - Work closely with business stakeholders and subject matter experts to elicit and document data requirements. Translate business requirements into technical specifications and data models that align with organizational goals and objectives. Technical Leadership : - Provide technical leadership and guidance on data modeling best practices, methodologies, and tools. Mentor junior data modelers and collaborate with cross-functional teams to promote knowledge sharing and skills development. Documentation and Communication : - Document data models, data flows, and data mappings using standard modeling notations and tools. Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders in a clear and concise manner. Qualifications : - Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field. - Proven experience as a data modeler or database designer in a corporate environment. - Proficiency in data modeling tools such as ERwin, ER/Studio, or PowerDesigner. - Strong SQL skills and experience working with relational databases such as Oracle, SQL Server, or PostgreSQL. And also on Snowflake, Databricks. - Knowledge of data warehousing concepts, dimensional modeling, and ETL processes. - Familiarity with data governance frameworks, data integration techniques, and data modeling best practices. - Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills. - Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment and manage multiple priorities simultaneously. Preferred Qualifications : - Certification in data modeling or database administration (e.g., CDMP, Oracle Certified Professional). - Experience with NoSQL databases, big data technologies, or cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud). - Knowledge of data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or QlikView. - Familiarity with agile development methodologies and DevOps practices.

What you would do in this role Develop and implement AI models and GenAI applications to address business challenges in semiconductors, enterprise technology, consumer technology, medical technology and related industries. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and deploy models into production environments. Support the creation of industry-leading points-of-view in the client domains you are working on that ensures our positioning as a value-partner Develop and implement GenAI based solutions through contextual prompt engineering and prompt tuning and supporting solution architects on the design of GenAI-powered solutions/assets. Utilize your expertise in PLM/ERP/CRM/Contact Center systems to integrate data sources and ensure seamless operation of AI solutions. Design and develop machine learning models using Python, with proficiency in NLP and Computer Vision techniques. Leverage cloud platforms, with preference for Azure/GCP, and experience with AWS is also valued. Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends, contributing to continuous improvement initiatives within the organization. Qualification Who we are looking for? Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science/MBA in a quant discipline in Data Science, Engineering, Industrial or related field. 2-5 years of hands-on experience in data science, with a focus on industries mentioned above. Proven track record of developing AI models in areas such as channel analytics, marketing & customer experience, supply chain analytics, predictive maintenance, production optimization, and connected products. Strong proficiency in Python programming, with experience in NLP and Computer Vision. Exposure to PLM/ERP/CRM systems and understanding of their integration with AI solutions. Experience with cloud platforms, preferably Azure/GCP, and familiarity with AWS. Knowledge of LLM exposure and experience with tools such as ChatGPT, Llama 2, Claude 2, Hugging Face, etc. for prompt engineering, prompt tuning, etc will be an advantage.

column2: The intersection of Global Tech Team and business Insights has opened a huge, and largely untapped potential. We are looking for a Senior Software Developer wanting to join Nepa's Global Tech team, working together with us to deliver actionable insights to widely recognized companies across the world. Your profile as our Senior Technical Analyst As a Senior Technical Analyst at Nepa, you have 3+ years experience in technical and logical problem solving, data analysis, and data engineering. Good understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP). You are a quick learner when it comes to new concepts and software, and you have ability to adapt to an existing, complex environment. To thrive in the role, you should be a self-motivated, independent team-player that are able to work in different team constellations.  The detailed information on skill sets and personal competencies is listed below: In this role, you will need to:  Key Responsibilities: - As a  Senior Technical Analyst  at Nepa you will combine many different technical skills as part of larger deliverables where your focus will be to deliver large scale insight analytics through our dashboards and reporting platforms.  - You will use your analytical and programming skills to bridge great theoretical ideas with intuitive products, converting multi-source data into actionable insights.  - Take ownership of debugging and error-solving processes, ensuring the smooth operation and enhancement of existing software products and data pipelines.  - Apply data engineering principles to design, build, and maintain data pipelines, ensuring efficient and reliable data flow between systems and sources. Technical Experience: - Proficiency in scripting and programming languages such as Python or R, including commonly used libraries. Basic knowledge of C# and .NET technologies.  - Familiarity with databases, including MSSQL and MySQL.  - Strong data visualization skills.  - Working knowledge of MS-Office tools: Excel, PowerPoint, Word.  - Familiarity or experience with Google Cloud Platform is advantageous.   Professional Attributes: - Exceptional data analytical and problem-solving abilities.  - Strong sense of teamwork, accountability.  - Eager to learn, have good communication and collaboration skills.  A few more things - You have a graduate degree, computer science/IT, engineering, or relevant field.  - You have 3-5 years of experience as a Technical Analyst. - Excellent data analytical and problem-solving skills. - Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written). - Strong sense of teamwork, accountability. - You share our vision to become the world leading data-to-growth company.  - You live our values daily | We see what others dont | We love it and it shows | We cut the crap | We care and act accordingly |. - You take pride in delivering high level of services, we are known for that. Who are we? Nepa is the frontrunner when it comes to data-driven decision making. We are in the sense-making business, combining and democratizing technology, research and big data to give our clients the confidence to act. Our passion is to find the quickest path from consumer data to execution to empower our clients to light the way forward to sustained growth. We nurture passionate people who are always striving to reach the next level in their field of expertise. When joining Nepa, you will get the opportunity to work in a dynamic environment where we encourage entrepreneurial principles and continuous improvements in everything we do. Nepa is a global company at the crossroads of research, consulting and IT. We use technology and industry expertise to develop innovative and efficient research solutions that go beyond insights and enable action. By combining survey data, behavioural data and business data, we help our clients become truly customer centric by tying what consumers say to what they actually do. Headquartered in Stockholm, we have ongoing assignments in over 50 countries across five continents. Local presence in Denmark, Finland, India, Norway, Singapore, Sweden, United States and the United Kingdom ensures hands-on service for our clients. Next step! We review applications as we receive them, and interviews will be held continuously so please submit your application as soon as possible.

column2: Role: Engineering Report Writer Responsibilities: Data Analysis:  Collect, organize, and analyze engineering data related to various audits including Electrical, Energy, Safety, Fire, and Water audits. Comprehensive Study:  Conduct a thorough study of the analyzed data, identifying patterns, trends, anomalies, and areas of improvement. Report Generation:  Prepare detailed engineering reports encompassing findings, analysis, recommendations, and actionable insights tailored to specific audit types such as Electrical audits, Energy audits, Safety audits, Fire audits, Water audits, and others provided by ESEA. Technical Expertise:  Demonstrate deep understanding and expertise in engineering principles, standards, regulations, and best practices relevant to the respective audit domains. Quality Assurance:  Ensure the accuracy, completeness, and consistency of engineering reports, adhering to ESEA's quality standards and client requirements. Visual Representation:  Present data and analysis visually through charts, graphs, diagrams, and other visual aids to enhance understanding and clarity in the reports. Client Communication:  Communicate effectively with clients to understand their requirements, address inquiries, and present findings and recommendations in a clear and professional manner. Regulatory Compliance:  Ensure that engineering reports comply with relevant industry standards, regulations, codes, and guidelines applicable to the specific audit areas. Continuous Improvement:  Stay updated on advancements in engineering methodologies, tools, and technologies to enhance the quality and efficiency of report writing processes. Collaboration:  Collaborate with engineers, subject matter experts, and other stakeholders within ESEA to gather insights, validate findings, and ensure alignment with company objectives. Project Management:  Manage multiple engineering report writing projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery, resource optimization, and adherence to project timelines and budgets. Documentation:  Maintain accurate documentation of data sources, methodologies, assumptions, and calculations used in the engineering reports for transparency, traceability, and audit purposes. Feedback Integration:  Incorporate feedback from clients, peers, and internal reviewers to refine and improve the quality and effectiveness of engineering reports over time. By fulfilling these roles and responsibilities with diligence and expertise, the Engineering Report Writer contributes significantly to ESEA's reputation for delivering high-quality, insightful, and actionable engineering reports across various audit domains.

column2: ThrivePass EDI Specialist About ThrivePass.  ThrivePass' purpose is to empower employees to thrive. Our holistic benefits suite is designed to support employee wellbeing throughout their lifecycle within an organization.  We value our employees, their contributions, and strongly believe in employee development. Everything we do is tied to our CARE values: Courageous, Authentic, Resourceful and Excellent. Performance at ThrivePass is measured by embodiment of our CARE values and the accomplishment of quarterly Big 3 goals.  Our Why We empower our clients, and their employees, to Thrive through the personalization of employee benefits and data-driven insights. About the Role.  The purpose of this role is to analyze, test and maintain electronic data interchange across ThrivePass products and systems. The EDI Specialist is responsible for the set-up and maintenance of new and existing vendor and carrier connections. In addition, the role supports in the design and implementation of partnership integrations.  Responsibilities. Consistently hit quarterly goals while embodying our CARE values. Analyze      and design benefit files including, but not limited to, ANSI X12 834 file      specifications. Capture and document business and functional requirements, perform analysis, and testing. Manage and maintain an active pipeline of 30+ file integration projects within established SLAs. Ensure elected EDI (Electronic Data Interchange) offering adheres to clients needs and regulatory requirements. Work directly with carriers and vendors to review requirements, coordinate testing, and ensure files are production ready. Troubleshoot and support client and partner inquiries regarding existing EDI and API integrations.  Use available configuration tools in proprietary middleware software to build file process automations.  Partner with internal development team to build new, complex file automations and set up SFTP exchange. Participate      in sustainment responsibilities, such as production monitoring, file      maintenance, and tracing where files are in the EDI lifecycle. Resolve issues and complications, answers customer questions and identify patterns or trends with problems and recommend prompt solutions. Provide technical expertise and support to other colleagues in the business by providing recommendations on problem resolution when they arise. Own the development of new processes and procedural documentation.  Collaborate with various business teams to improve efficiency and speed of internal operations by improving process and/or system capabilities. Partner with middleware product team to enhance configuration tools, processes, and reporting by writing business requirements and testing proprietary software. Requirements. 2+ years of experience with 5010/834 File Format, Jscript, and HIPAA compliance.  2+ years working with EDI formats (i.e. Fixed width, JSON, XML, etc.).  2+ years experience working with benefit enrollment platforms (i.e. TPA, COBRA, CDH, Health and Wealth, etc.) Familiarity with data exchange which leverages APIs. Has experience working with multiple different carrier specifications. Excellent communication and writing skills. Attention to detail and highly effective planning, organizational, time management, analytical, and problem-solving skills. Ability to work independently, demonstrate initiative, and exercise judgment in a fast paced and changing environment. Handle sensitive information in a confidential manner. Knowledge of HSA, HRA, FSA and COBRA a plus. Additional Information. ThrivePass is committed to providing an inclusive and welcoming environment for all team members. We do not and shall not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion (creed), gender, gender expression, age, national origin (ancestry), disability, marital status, sexual orientation, or military status, in any of its activities or operations.

Experience in Logstash Grok patterns and other filters for log integration. Knowledge of APM setup and configurations. Experience integrating Mainframe/Corebanking logs into ELK is a plus. column2: As a rapidly expanding global company, growing both organically and through acquisitions, we are looking for a Business Intelligence Analyst to be a part of the Quote-to-Cash (Q2C) Performance Analytics Strategy (PAS) team     Q2C PAS team is within the Revenue Growth Automation (RGA) org which is the global business process owner for Salesforce for end-to-end Quote-to-Cash processes     The RGA mission is to drive best-in-class end-to-end Q2C performance, improving the experience of our sellers, operators and customers through transformation     You will be given the opportunity and empowered to influence using the power of data and analytics      As a Senior Analyst - Data Engineering, you will play a pivotal role in designing, constructing, and maintaining the ETL/ELT components     Your focus will be on building scalable data pipelines, ensuring data quality, and supporting data-driven decision-making within the organization     You will be responsible for ensuring the accuracy, reliability, and consistency of data across the Q2C organization     Your role involves designing and implementing data quality processes, conducting assessments, and collaborating with various teams to establish and maintain high data quality standards         Role Description:             Table Stakes:    Build systems that collect, manage, and transform raw data into usable information for data scientists and business analysts to interpret. Wrangling large data sets using SQL, Python to identify, quantify and monitor risks in multiple processes across the company.           Own your coverage:    Take ownership of design and development of complex data pipelines, integrations, database objects and solutions that align with business objectives. Ensure data quality, integrity, security, and scalability.   Drive multiple/cross-function data source integration and modeling strategies to enable seamless metrics development experience for BI teams and to ultimately enable data-driven decision-making for our stakeholders.           Be an example:    Provide strong technical expertise within the data engineering team. Collaborate with other data engineers, business analysts on solutioning data requests.           CI/CD:    Champion engineering best practices, automate processes, and contribute to activities that streamline operations and enhance overall reliability of our data sets. Actively seek opportunities for innovation in data engineering processes and solutions in pursuit of business value.           Get predictive:    Proactively looks for opportunities to apply data science models to find/prove business value           Data migration, Documentation:    Our tech stack is evolving, as we are ever adapting. Therefore, at some point, you can expect migration, validation testing from one system to another. This work is admittedly less exciting, but it is a value and critical to drive scale.               Desired Skills and Experience:           4+ years of experience in data engineering and/or related roles. Passion and love for solving business problems using data.         bachelors degree in Computer science or equivalent alternative education, skills, and/or practical equivalent experience.         Proficiency in common analytical programming languages (eg Python or R) and SQL, ETL/ELT tools/techniques, advanced data modeling techniques.         Fair understanding of end-to-end data development, including data model design, quality review, deployment, audits and maintenance.         Familiar with basics of statistics and machine learning methods. Curiosity in doing POCs/POVs using data science techniques/models to find/prove business value.         Stay updated on the latest trends and advancements in data engineering field(tools and techniques) and curious to find potential areas to apply them to find/prove business value.         Asks the right questions. Rationalizes business value and the approaches taken. Collaborates and vets the approach with peers. Effectively communicates(written and verbal) with them to move projects forward.           Degree or equivalent relevant experience required.
